content: compass is an 8 point star blanket featuring the popcorn in the star peaks this pattern was a request from a follower who was searching for a star blanket that incorporated the popcorn thus compass was born this pattern has been tested pictures have been added to help along the way this pattern can be made in any weight yarn the chain 1 to close the popcorn is not counted as a stitch please contact buttonnose crochet for full pattern support *this pattern is the property of natasha thorley please do not copy share or claim this pattern as your own also no video is to be made of this pattern without the permission of buttonnose crochet © buttonnose crochet 2020*
